title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Inquiry-Based Learning Design Diffusion and Collaborative Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design principles and digital tool implementation experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four stages of inquiry-based learning design (problem definition-hypothesis formulation-execution-reflection) in a simulated environment
Achieve knowledge internalization by collaboratively revising draft learning designs with peer experts at least three times using collaborative learning tools
Improve the design prototype to meet social effectiveness indicators by at least 80% through VR-based formative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
